data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Ewa, Nauru who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ewa, Nauru
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Ewa.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Ewa you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Ewa, Nauru to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Ewa, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Ewa, Nauru humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 63 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ewa, Nauru has a population of 500.

We estimate Ewa has 63 people who might know Jesus, 365 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 72 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.
